entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 03:48 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -20.8°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
